engChrName: I'll do my best to get in touch with both the police and guild to make arrangements with them.
engSearchText:
I'll do my best to get in touch with both the police
and guild to make arrangements with them.
jpnChrName: 各方面への連絡と段取りは任せてくれ。
jpnSearchText: 各方面への連絡と段取りは任せてくれ。

engChrName: But time's not on our side, so we can't just sit around. Whatever you do, keep Marielle and the kid safe!
engSearchText:
But time's not on our side, so we can't just sit around.
Whatever you do, keep Marielle and the kid safe!
jpnChrName: だがこのままでは手遅れになりかねん…… マリエルたちの事、どうか頼んだぞ！
jpnSearchText:
だがこのままでは手遅れになりかねん……
マリエルたちの事、どうか頼んだぞ！

engChrName: The police and guild are rushing over as fast as they can, but it's going to take time for them to get here.
engSearchText:
The police and guild are rushing over as fast as they
can, but it's going to take time for them to get here.
jpnChrName: ギルドや警察もこちらに急行しているが やはり時間はかかりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドや警察もこちらに急行しているが
やはり時間はかかりそうだ。

engChrName: I hate to say this, but you guys will have to go on ahead and confront those thugs by yourselves. Good luck!
engSearchText:
I hate to say this, but you guys will have to go on
ahead and confront those thugs by yourselves.
Good luck!
jpnChrName: すまないが、お前たちだけでも 先行して突入してくれ！
jpnSearchText:
すまないが、お前たちだけでも
先行して突入してくれ！

engChrName: Those goons should be just up ahead.
engSearchText: Those goons should be just up ahead.
jpnChrName: 連中が向かったのはこの先だな。
jpnSearchText: 連中が向かったのはこの先だな。

engChrName: Last thing we need is to get spotted and have more people taken hostage. Better to follow 'em on foot the rest of the way.
engSearchText:
Last thing we need is to get spotted and have more
people taken hostage. Better to follow 'em on foot the
rest of the way.
jpnChrName: 気付かれて人質に取られたら厄介だ。 ここからは歩きで追跡するぞ。
jpnSearchText:
気付かれて人質に取られたら厄介だ。
ここからは歩きで追跡するぞ。

engChrName: We'll hit you up once we find 'em, Dingo. In the meantime, try to contact as many people as you can.
engSearchText:
We'll hit you up once we find 'em, Dingo. In the
meantime, try to contact as many people as you can.
jpnChrName: 発見しだい連絡する──お前は ここで各方面と連絡を取ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
発見しだい連絡する──お前は
ここで各方面と連絡を取ってくれ。

engChrName: Yes, please! Especially the police and guild! We could really use the help!
engSearchText:
Yes, please! Especially the police and guild! We could
really use the help!
jpnChrName: 警察とギルド方面への 働きかけをお願いします……！
jpnSearchText:
警察とギルド方面への
働きかけをお願いします……！

engChrName: Right. I'll see if I can get them to come over and provide backup once things are under control in the city.
engSearchText:
Right. I'll see if I can get them to come over and
provide backup once things are under control in
the city.
jpnChrName: ああ、乱闘騒ぎが収まりしだい、 応援に来るよう手配する。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、乱闘騒ぎが収まりしだい、
応援に来るよう手配する。

engChrName: ...Take good care of Marielle and the kid in there.
engSearchText: ...Take good care of Marielle and the kid in there.
jpnChrName: ……マリエルたちを頼む。
jpnSearchText: ……マリエルたちを頼む。

engChrName: You got it!
engSearchText: You got it!
jpnChrName: 了解ですっ！
jpnSearchText: 了解ですっ！

engChrName: Well, what're we waiting for? Let's get to work. The sooner we find the girls, the sooner we can get them out!
engSearchText:
Well, what're we waiting for? Let's get to work.
The sooner we find the girls, the sooner we can get
them out!
jpnChrName: ハッ、とっとと捜し出して サクッと助け出してやるよ！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、とっとと捜し出して
サクッと助け出してやるよ！

engChrName: Indeed. Time to start tracking the perpetrators.
engSearchText: Indeed. Time to start tracking the perpetrators.
jpnChrName: それでは追跡を 開始いたしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
それでは追跡を
開始いたしましょう。

engChrName: For a pretty normal car, those guys sure managed to get it way out into the dunes. Sheesh.
engSearchText:
For a pretty normal car, those guys sure managed to
get it way out into the dunes. Sheesh.
jpnChrName: しかし、車とはいえ よくこんな砂漠を行きやがるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、車とはいえ
よくこんな砂漠を行きやがるぜ。

engChrName: Normally, this is about as far as you could go in one. The terrain past here is too rough.
engSearchText:
Normally, this is about as far as you could go in one.
The terrain past here is too rough.
jpnChrName: このあたりはギリギリ行けるが すぐ車じゃ通れない地形になる筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
このあたりはギリギリ行けるが
すぐ車じゃ通れない地形になる筈だ。

engChrName: For sure. That's exactly what happened the last time I was here—we couldn't use our vehicles for very long at all.
engSearchText:
For sure. That's exactly what happened the last time I
was here—we couldn't use our vehicles for very long
at all.
jpnChrName: はい……以前来た時も すぐに車が使えなくなりました。
jpnSearchText:
はい……以前来た時も
すぐに車が使えなくなりました。

engChrName: And it's not even really a 'normal' car, it's a limousine. You'd think that would do even worse in this kind of environment...
engSearchText:
And it's not even really a 'normal' car, it's a limousine.
You'd think that would do even worse in this kind
of environment...
jpnChrName: どうやらリムジンタイプの車のようですが こんな環境には向いていないでしょうし……
jpnSearchText:
どうやらリムジンタイプの車のようですが
こんな環境には向いていないでしょうし……

engChrName: On a separate note, I can confirm that the both of them are travelers from Oración to the northeast.
engSearchText:
On a separate note, I can confirm that the both of
them are travelers from Oración to the northeast.
jpnChrName: ちなみに２人とも北東のオラシオン市の 旅行者であるのは確かなようです。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに２人とも北東のオラシオン市の
旅行者であるのは確かなようです。

engChrName: One of them was born into wealth, while the other appears to have made their fortune through a new business venture.
engSearchText:
One of them was born into wealth, while the other
appears to have made their fortune through a new
business venture.
jpnChrName: やはり一人は富裕層出身、もう一人は 新規ビジネスで財を成したようで……
jpnSearchText:
やはり一人は富裕層出身、もう一人は
新規ビジネスで財を成したようで……

engChrName: Nobody seems to have direct links to A, including the two bodyguards hired to escort them.
engSearchText:
Nobody seems to have direct links to A, including the
two bodyguards hired to escort them.
jpnChrName: 雇われた護衛２名も含め、 《Ａ》との直接の繋がりはなさそうです。
jpnSearchText:
雇われた護衛２名も含め、
《Ａ》との直接の繋がりはなさそうです。

engChrName: Huh? How the hell do you know all—
engSearchText: Huh? How the hell do you know all—
jpnChrName: は……？ 何でそんなことが──
jpnSearchText:
は……？
何でそんなことが──

engChrName: Last night, when we encountered them at the hotel, I ran a check on their identities via the orbal network.
engSearchText:
Last night, when we encountered them at the hotel, I
ran a check on their identities via the orbal network.
jpnChrName: 昨夜、ホテルで遭遇した際に 導力ネット経由で照会いたしました。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜、ホテルで遭遇した際に
導力ネット経由で照会いたしました。

engChrName: Rest assured, my inquiry was within legal limits and undertaken purely as a part of my work in risk management data collection.
engSearchText:
Rest assured, my inquiry was within legal limits and
undertaken purely as a part of my work in risk
management data collection.
jpnChrName: あくまで危機管理データ収集の一環で、 適法範囲内なのでご心配なく。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで危機管理データ収集の一環で、
適法範囲内なのでご心配なく。

engChrName: Umm... That's good to hear, I guess.
engSearchText: Umm... That's good to hear, I guess.
jpnChrName: そ、そうだったんですか……
jpnSearchText: そ、そうだったんですか……

engChrName: Damn. That's a lot of power for a random-ass maid to have.
engSearchText:
Damn. That's a lot of power for a random-ass maid
to have.
jpnChrName: ……オイ、やっぱり ヤベーどころじゃねぇんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
……オイ、やっぱり
ヤベーどころじゃねぇんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Good thing she's on our side. I'd hate to have a lady as capable as her as an enemy.
engSearchText:
Good thing she's on our side. I'd hate to have a lady
as capable as her as an enemy.
jpnChrName: ま、敵に回さなきゃ これほど心強い相手もいねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、敵に回さなきゃ
これほど心強い相手もいねぇだろ。

engChrName: You're too kind, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: You're too kind, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ふふ、恐れ入ります。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、恐れ入ります。

engChrName: But wait—if these guys are just tourists, it seems weird to me that they'd just go hanging out in the desert.
engSearchText:
But wait—if these guys are just tourists, it seems
weird to me that they'd just go hanging out in
the desert.
jpnChrName: でもただの旅行者となると…… 砂漠に来たこと自体が異様かもです。
jpnSearchText:
でもただの旅行者となると……
砂漠に来たこと自体が異様かもです。

engChrName: I think so, too. It makes you wonder what they could possibly be after.
engSearchText:
I think so, too. It makes you wonder what they could
possibly be after.
jpnChrName: ええ、一体何の目的で……
jpnSearchText: ええ、一体何の目的で……

engChrName: ...Stay focused. There are still more tracks to follow. Be careful and keep your eyes peeled.
engSearchText:
...Stay focused. There are still more tracks to follow.
Be careful and keep your eyes peeled.
jpnChrName: ……轍（わだち）もまだ先に続いている。 ここからは慎重に進むぞ。
jpnSearchText:
……轍（わだち）もまだ先に続いている。
ここからは慎重に進むぞ。

engChrName: Jackpot. I see footprints for four men and two ladies.
engSearchText: Jackpot. I see footprints for four men and two ladies.
jpnChrName: ハン、男４人に 娘２人の足跡があるな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、男４人に
娘２人の足跡があるな。

engChrName: They must've just been here. If we rush in right now, we could still catch them!
engSearchText:
They must've just been here. If we rush in right now,
we could still catch them!
jpnChrName: つい先ほどくらいです。 今ならすぐ突入すれば……！
jpnSearchText:
つい先ほどくらいです。
今ならすぐ突入すれば……！

engChrName: Good to know. It sounds like the guild and the cops have gotten things back under control in the city, too.
engSearchText:
Good to know. It sounds like the guild and the cops
have gotten things back under control in the city, too.
jpnChrName: そうか……ギルドと警察も ようやく対応が終わったようだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……ギルドと警察も
ようやく対応が終わったようだ。

engChrName: They're on their way, but I wouldn't expect them to get there anytime soon.
engSearchText:
They're on their way, but I wouldn't expect them to
get there anytime soon.
jpnChrName: ただ到着には時間がかかるだろう。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ただ到着には時間がかかるだろう。

engChrName: But we don't have any time to wait...
engSearchText: But we don't have any time to wait...
jpnChrName: 待っている時間はなさそうですね……
jpnSearchText: 待っている時間はなさそうですね……

engChrName: Yep. Dingo, keep in touch with the others. We're going on ahead.
engSearchText:
Yep. Dingo, keep in touch with the others.
We're going on ahead.
jpnChrName: ああ──このまま先行する。 そっち方面の連絡は頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──このまま先行する。
そっち方面の連絡は頼んだぜ。

engChrName: Got'cha. Be careful out there. I'm counting on you.
engSearchText: Got'cha. Be careful out there. I'm counting on you.
jpnChrName: 了解だ、気を付けて行け。 ……頼んだぞ。
jpnSearchText:
了解だ、気を付けて行け。
……頼んだぞ。

engChrName: Huh?!
engSearchText: Huh?!

engChrName: Wah!
engSearchText: Wah!

engChrName: That happened last night as well.
engSearchText: That happened last night as well.
jpnChrName: 昨夜見かけた……
jpnSearchText: 昨夜見かけた……

engChrName: Yeah, and when we went inside the underground waterway back in the city.
engSearchText:
Yeah, and when we went inside the underground
waterway back in the city.
jpnChrName: はい、それと 地下水路に入った時も……
jpnSearchText:
はい、それと
地下水路に入った時も……

engChrName: That can only mean one thing, then.
engSearchText: That can only mean one thing, then.
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、っつーことは。
jpnSearchText: ……ハッ、っつーことは。

engChrName: Right. This might just give us the chance we've been looking for.
engSearchText:
Right. This might just give us the chance we've been
looking for.
jpnChrName: ああ……ある意味 チャンスかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……ある意味
チャンスかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: Obviously, rescuing Shaheena and Marielle comes first. No questions asked.
engSearchText:
Obviously, rescuing Shaheena and Marielle
comes first. No questions asked.
jpnChrName: 今はあくまでシャヒーナさんと マリエルさんが最優先です。
jpnSearchText:
今はあくまでシャヒーナさんと
マリエルさんが最優先です。

engChrName: But we should make sure we're prepared for anything, just in case!
engSearchText:
But we should make sure we're prepared for anything,
just in case!
jpnChrName: ですが、それ以外にも 前もって備えておきましょう！
jpnSearchText:
ですが、それ以外にも
前もって備えておきましょう！

engChrName: Yes, I think that's an apt assessment.
engSearchText: Yes, I think that's an apt assessment.
jpnChrName: ……良い判断かと。
jpnSearchText: ……良い判断かと。

engChrName: There they are!
engSearchText: There they are!
jpnChrName: いたか……！
jpnSearchText: いたか……！

engChrName: Shaheena! Marielle!
engSearchText: Shaheena! Marielle!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナさん、マリエルさん！
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナさん、マリエルさん！

engChrName: It's you guys!
engSearchText: It's you guys!
jpnChrName: み、皆さん……！？
jpnSearchText: み、皆さん……！？

engChrName: You came! You really came...!
engSearchText: You came! You really came...!
jpnChrName: お兄さんたち、来てくれたんだ……！
jpnSearchText: お兄さんたち、来てくれたんだ……！

engChrName: We sure did. Sorry to keep you two waiting.
engSearchText: We sure did. Sorry to keep you two waiting.
jpnChrName: 悪い、遅れちまったな。
jpnSearchText: 悪い、遅れちまったな。

engChrName: I'm so glad you're both okay. Hold on just a minute, we're going to—
engSearchText:
I'm so glad you're both okay. Hold on just a minute,
we're going to—
jpnChrName: 良かった、無事みたいで。 待っててください、今──
jpnSearchText:
良かった、無事みたいで。
待っててください、今──

engChrName: Hold up! What the hell is that thing?!
engSearchText: Hold up! What the hell is that thing?!
jpnChrName: って、なんだありゃあ……？
jpnSearchText: って、なんだありゃあ……？

engChrName: Huh...? What're you guys doing here?
engSearchText: Huh...? What're you guys doing here?
jpnChrName: ──なんだァ、お前らは……
jpnSearchText: <C2>──なんだァ、お前らは……

engChrName: Decided to come join the party, have you?
engSearchText: Decided to come join the party, have you?
jpnChrName: あァ、お前らも パーティに参加したいのかよ……？
jpnSearchText:
あァ、お前らも
パーティに参加したいのかよ……？

engChrName: Fine with me! Come on over and let's have some fun, man!
engSearchText:
Fine with me! Come on over and let's have some
fun, man!
jpnChrName: いいじゃんいいじゃん！ 一緒に愉しもうじゃないかぁ……！
jpnSearchText:
いいじゃんいいじゃん！
一緒に愉しもうじゃないかぁ……！

engChrName: Something's definitely wrong with these bozos.
engSearchText: Something's definitely wrong with these bozos.
jpnChrName: チッ……普通じゃねえな。
jpnSearchText: チッ……普通じゃねえな。

engChrName: I'm picking up this weird aura, like they're being infested by something!
engSearchText:
I'm picking up this weird aura, like they're being
infested by something!
jpnChrName: “息吹”がおかしいです！ 何かに侵されているような……！
jpnSearchText:
“息吹”がおかしいです！
何かに侵されているような……！

engChrName: What the hell? They sure don't look like zombie puppets to me!
engSearchText:
What the hell? They sure don't look like zombie
puppets to me!
jpnChrName: ハン、くたばって操られてるって わけじゃなさそうだが……！
jpnSearchText:
ハン、くたばって操られてるって
わけじゃなさそうだが……！

engChrName: ...Incoming attack. Beware.
engSearchText: ...Incoming attack. Beware.
jpnChrName: ──来ます、迎撃を。
jpnSearchText: ──来ます、迎撃を。

engChrName: RAAAAAAAAAHH!
engSearchText: RAAAAAAAAAHH!
jpnChrName: キシャアアアアアアアッ……！！！
jpnSearchText: <C2><S5>キシャアアアアアアアッ……！！！

engChrName: Whew...
engSearchText: Whew...
jpnChrName: ふうっ……
jpnSearchText: ふうっ……

engChrName: Weird vibes or not, in the end, they were still pushovers.
engSearchText:
Weird vibes or not, in the end, they were
still pushovers.
jpnChrName: 妙な“気”を纏ってやがったが 所詮はザコだったな。
jpnSearchText:
妙な“気”を纏ってやがったが
所詮はザコだったな。

engChrName: Wow, that was amazing! You guys are awesome!
engSearchText: Wow, that was amazing! You guys are awesome!
jpnChrName: やったあ！ すごいよ、フェリたち！！
jpnSearchText:
やったあ！
すごいよ、フェリたち！！

engChrName: *sniffle* We're saved! Finally, I can get out of these sandy—
engSearchText:
*sniffle* We're saved! Finally, I can get out of these
sandy—
jpnChrName: ううっ、助かりました～…… もう服が砂だらけで──
jpnSearchText:
ううっ、助かりました～……
もう服が砂だらけで──

engChrName: Up above!
engSearchText: Up above!
jpnSearchText: ──上だ！！

engChrName: I knew it!
engSearchText: I knew it!
jpnChrName: っ……やっぱり……！
jpnSearchText: っ……やっぱり……！

engChrName: They were lying in wait!
engSearchText: They were lying in wait!
jpnChrName: 潜んでやがったかよ……！
jpnSearchText: 潜んでやがったかよ……！

engChrName: This ain't a show, so quit spectatin' and come out where we can see you. Now!
engSearchText:
This ain't a show, so quit spectatin' and come out
where we can see you. Now!
jpnChrName: 高見の見物は終わりだ── 居るんだろうが、出てこいや！
jpnSearchText:
高見の見物は終わりだ──
居るんだろうが、出てこいや！

engChrName: I see. So you were prepared for me to ambush you.
engSearchText: I see. So you were prepared for me to ambush you.
jpnChrName: なるほど、私が潜んでいる 可能性に備えていましたか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、私が潜んでいる
可能性に備えていましたか。

engChrName: Are you one of Almata's minions? Or some kind of assassin of theirs?
engSearchText:
Are you one of Almata's minions? Or some kind of
assassin of theirs?
jpnChrName: アルマータの手先── いえ、暗殺者（アサシン）ですか？
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの手先──
いえ、暗殺者（アサシン）ですか？

engChrName: No. I've simply formed a contract with them—no more and no less.
engSearchText:
No. I've simply formed a contract with them—no
more and no less.
jpnChrName: 否定します──彼らとは “契約”を結んでいるに過ぎません。
jpnSearchText:
否定します──彼らとは
“契約”を結んでいるに過ぎません。

engChrName: Moreover, our mission—mine and Ishtanti's—is over now.
engSearchText:
Moreover, our mission—mine and Ishtanti's—is
over now.
jpnChrName: そして今回、私と《イシュタンティ》の 役目はここまでです。
jpnSearchText:
そして今回、私と《イシュタンティ》の
役目はここまでです。

engChrName: Ishtanti... Is that what you call your angel friend?
engSearchText: Ishtanti... Is that what you call your angel friend?
jpnChrName: イシュタンティ…… そいつがその“天使”の名前か。
jpnSearchText:
イシュタンティ……
そいつがその“天使”の名前か。

engChrName: Whatever it is, it certainly doesn't look like it was produced with contemporary technology.
engSearchText:
Whatever it is, it certainly doesn't look like it was
produced with contemporary technology.
jpnChrName: ……どうやら現代の技術で 製造されたものでは無さそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……どうやら現代の技術で
製造されたものでは無さそうですね。

engChrName: Those slash marks—they distinctly resemble ones I've seen within Marduk's records.
engSearchText:
Those slash marks—they distinctly resemble ones I've
seen within Marduk's records.
jpnChrName: その斬撃痕──ＭＫ社の調査記録に 類似のものがあったと記憶しています。
jpnSearchText:
その斬撃痕──ＭＫ社の調査記録に
類似のものがあったと記憶しています。

engChrName: Specifically, those from the investigation into the Eisenschild squad that was eradicated two months ago.
engSearchText:
Specifically, those from the investigation into the
Eisenschild squad that was eradicated two
months ago.
jpnChrName: ──先々月に全滅した、 アイゼンシルト中隊についての。
jpnSearchText:
──先々月に全滅した、
アイゼンシルト中隊についての。
……！

engChrName: Are you from the same old group as that Almata guy? Did you help him attack Aida and her corps?!
engSearchText:
Are you from the same old group as that
Almata guy? Did you help him attack Aida and
her corps?!
jpnChrName: あの幹部（メルキオル）の“古巣”の…… アイーダさんたちを襲った……！？
jpnSearchText:
あの幹部（メルキオル）の“古巣”の……
アイーダさんたちを襲った……！？

engChrName: I did. That was part of my contract.
engSearchText: I did. That was part of my contract.
jpnChrName: 肯定します──契約の一環として。
jpnSearchText: 肯定します──契約の一環として。

engChrName: The Eisenschild commander put up a harder fight than I anticipated. She has my respect.
engSearchText:
The Eisenschild commander put up a harder fight
than I anticipated. She has my respect.
jpnChrName: 女性中隊長は想定以上の強敵でした。 敬意を表します。
jpnSearchText:
女性中隊長は想定以上の強敵でした。
敬意を表します。

engChrName: Gah... Raaaaaah!
engSearchText: Gah... Raaaaaah!
jpnChrName: ッ……ああああっ！！
jpnSearchText: ッ……ああああっ！！

engChrName: ...Ms. Al-Fayed.
engSearchText: ...Ms. Al-Fayed.
jpnChrName: ……フェリ様。
jpnSearchText: ……フェリ様。

engChrName: *pant* *pant*
engSearchText: *pant* *pant*
jpnChrName: ……はあっはあっ……
jpnSearchText: ……はあっはあっ……

engChrName: This concludes the on-site testing.
engSearchText: This concludes the on-site testing.
jpnChrName: 一連の“実地検証”は完了しました。
jpnSearchText: 一連の“実地検証”は完了しました。

engChrName: I have no orders to engage in combat. Therefore, Ishtanti and I will be departing.
engSearchText:
I have no orders to engage in combat.
Therefore, Ishtanti and I will be departing.
jpnChrName: 交戦のオーダーは受けていないため 私たちは失礼します。
jpnSearchText:
交戦のオーダーは受けていないため
私たちは失礼します。

engChrName: Hey, isn't that—
engSearchText: Hey, isn't that—
jpnChrName: おい、あの女──！？
jpnSearchText: おい、あの女──！？

engChrName: It sure is. You know, miss, I've noticed something off about you since our run-in at the waterway.
engSearchText:
It sure is. You know, miss, I've noticed something
off about you since our run-in at the waterway.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりな。 ここでも、地下水路でも感じてたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱりな。
ここでも、地下水路でも感じてたぜ。

engChrName: It's like there's no warmth in your eyes. You view others, even yourself, as nothing but 'things.' Thought so at the club last night, too.
engSearchText:
It's like there's no warmth in your eyes. You view
others, even yourself, as nothing but 'things.'
Thought so at the club last night, too.
jpnChrName: 昨夜のステージと同じ──自分も他人も “物”として見てる温度のない視線をな。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜のステージと同じ──自分も他人も
“物”として見てる温度のない視線をな。

engChrName: ...You have an astute eye. Or, I suppose nose, in your case, due to how you pick up 'scents.'
engSearchText:
...You have an astute eye. Or, I suppose nose, in your
case, due to how you pick up 'scents.'
jpnChrName: ……なかなかの観察眼。 いえ、貴方の場合は“匂い”ですか。
jpnSearchText:
……なかなかの観察眼。
いえ、貴方の場合は“匂い”ですか。

engChrName: Regardless, do not let those senses of yours go to waste. Farewell.
engSearchText:
Regardless, do not let those senses of yours go
to waste. Farewell.
jpnChrName: せいぜいその嗅覚を無駄にせぬよう。 ──それでは。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜいその嗅覚を無駄にせぬよう。
──それでは。

engChrName: Tch. What a piece of work. Acting like she's above it all...
engSearchText:
Tch. What a piece of work. Acting like she's above
it all...
jpnChrName: チッ……余裕かましやがって。
jpnSearchText: チッ……余裕かましやがって。

engChrName: Ugh... I've still got a long ways to go...
engSearchText: Ugh... I've still got a long ways to go...
jpnChrName: はい…… ……わたし、まだまだです……
jpnSearchText:
はい……
……わたし、まだまだです……

engChrName: Oh, Feri...
engSearchText: Oh, Feri...
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん……
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん……

engChrName: I was hopin' we could nab that Genesis if she left an opening, but I guess she's not gonna make it that easy.
engSearchText:
I was hopin' we could nab that Genesis if she left an
opening, but I guess she's not gonna make it
that easy.
jpnChrName: ……ゲネシスも隙あらばと思ったが、 そんな甘い相手じゃなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
……ゲネシスも隙あらばと思ったが、
そんな甘い相手じゃなかったな。

engChrName: It's fine, really. I'm just glad nobody's hurt.
engSearchText: It's fine, really. I'm just glad nobody's hurt.
jpnChrName: いえ、いいんです。 みんな無事だっただけでも……
jpnSearchText:
いえ、いいんです。
みんな無事だっただけでも……

engChrName: Shaheena, are you okay?
engSearchText: Shaheena, are you okay?
jpnChrName: シャヒーナさん、大丈夫ですか？
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナさん、大丈夫ですか？

engChrName: My arm's a little tingly, but that's all. Thank you so much, Agnès!
engSearchText:
My arm's a little tingly, but that's all. Thank you so
much, Agnès!
jpnChrName: うん、ちょっと腕が痺れたけど…… ──アニエスさん、ありがとね！
jpnSearchText:
うん、ちょっと腕が痺れたけど……
──アニエスさん、ありがとね！

engChrName: What she said, times a million... Oooh, if only I had my camera with me!
engSearchText:
What she said, times a million... Oooh, if only I had
my camera with me!
jpnChrName: あ、ありがとうございます。 ……ううっ、カメラを持ってきてれば！
jpnSearchText:
あ、ありがとうございます。
……ううっ、カメラを持ってきてれば！

engChrName: Putting aside these bozos for a moment, just what the hell is that giant plant?
engSearchText:
Putting aside these bozos for a moment, just what the
hell is that giant plant?
jpnChrName: で、馬鹿共はともかく このデカイ植物はなんなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
で、馬鹿共はともかく
このデカイ植物はなんなんだ？

engChrName: My guess is a kind of succulent. From the way it's glowin', it could even be—
engSearchText:
My guess is a kind of succulent. From the way it's
glowin', it could even be—
jpnChrName: 多肉植物の一種だろう。 この輝き、もしかして──
jpnSearchText:
多肉植物の一種だろう。
この輝き、もしかして──

engChrName: ...And you have it. Alas that we appear to have missed the excitement.
engSearchText:
...And you have it. Alas that we appear to have
missed the excitement.
jpnChrName: ──ビンゴだったか。 良い場面は逃したようだが。
jpnSearchText:
──ビンゴだったか。
良い場面は逃したようだが。
……ぁ………

engChrName: You're...
engSearchText: You're...
jpnChrName: あ、貴方は……
jpnSearchText: あ、貴方は……

engChrName: You're the one who scouted out my sister.
engSearchText: You're the one who scouted out my sister.
jpnChrName: お姉のスカウトに来てた……
jpnSearchText: お姉のスカウトに来てた……

engChrName: Prince Sherid?!
engSearchText: Prince Sherid?!
jpnChrName: シェリド公太子殿下……！？
jpnSearchText: シェリド公太子殿下……！？

engChrName: Guessin' you were on the same trail we were?
engSearchText: Guessin' you were on the same trail we were?
jpnChrName: ……どうやらそちらも 同じネタを追ってたみたいですね？
jpnSearchText:
……どうやらそちらも
同じネタを追ってたみたいですね？

engChrName: In some fashion. As it so happens, our country and Calvard have had warm relations for a long time now.
engSearchText:
In some fashion. As it so happens, our country and
Calvard have had warm relations for a long time now.
jpnChrName: フフ、我が国とカルバードは 昔から良き隣人だからね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、我が国とカルバードは
昔から良き隣人だからね。

engChrName: We've been actively involved in the technology, investing, and, as you've seen, the movie production sectors recently as well.
engSearchText:
We've been actively involved in the technology,
investing, and, as you've seen, the movie production
sectors recently as well.
jpnChrName: 技術に投資、最近では映画産業にも 積極的に関わらせてもらっている。
jpnSearchText:
技術に投資、最近では映画産業にも
積極的に関わらせてもらっている。

engChrName: To that end, we have kept our eyes on certain kinds of activity, and... Well, Naje? Is that plant what we're looking for?
engSearchText:
To that end, we have kept our eyes on certain kinds
of activity, and... Well, Naje? Is that plant what we're
looking for?
jpnChrName: そんな中、怪しい動きを調べていたが…… ──ナージェ、その植物かい？
jpnSearchText:
そんな中、怪しい動きを調べていたが……
──ナージェ、その植物かい？

engChrName: Yes, Your Highness. It appears to be a type of agave plant containing alkaloids.
engSearchText:
Yes, Your Highness. It appears to be a type of agave
plant containing alkaloids.
jpnChrName: ええ、アルカロイド成分を含む 竜舌蘭（リュウゼツラン）の一種でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、アルカロイド成分を含む
竜舌蘭（リュウゼツラン）の一種でしょう。

engChrName: Most likely, it's been energized via reaction with the septium veins.
engSearchText:
Most likely, it's been energized via reaction with the
septium veins.
jpnChrName: やはり七耀脈に反応して 活性化しているようです。
jpnSearchText:
やはり七耀脈に反応して
活性化しているようです。

engChrName: Alkaloids? Those can only be extracted from certain types of plants, right?
engSearchText:
Alkaloids? Those can only be extracted from certain
types of plants, right?
jpnChrName: アルカロイド…… 一部の植物から抽出されるという。
jpnSearchText:
アルカロイド……
一部の植物から抽出されるという。

engChrName: Correct. They serve as an ingredient in things such as anesthetics.
engSearchText:
Correct. They serve as an ingredient in things such
as anesthetics.
jpnChrName: ええ、麻酔薬などの 原料にも使われる成分ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、麻酔薬などの
原料にも使われる成分ですね。

engChrName: However, depending on the amount, application, and plant type, they can also act as stimulants or produce hallucinations.
engSearchText:
However, depending on the amount, application, and
plant type, they can also act as stimulants or
produce hallucinations.
jpnChrName: ──植物の種類、用法・用量によっては 幻覚や覚醒作用をもたらすものもあります。
jpnSearchText:
──植物の種類、用法・用量によっては
幻覚や覚醒作用をもたらすものもあります。
……！

engChrName: So our guess was right on the mark.
engSearchText: So our guess was right on the mark.
jpnChrName: ハッ、予想通りだったみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、予想通りだったみてぇだな。

engChrName: Yeah. This thing's being used to make drugs.
engSearchText: Yeah. This thing's being used to make drugs.
jpnChrName: ああ──ドラッグの材料。
jpnSearchText: ああ──ドラッグの材料。

engChrName: It's clear as day that this all ties into what happened in Messeldam.
engSearchText:
It's clear as day that this all ties into what happened
in Messeldam.
jpnChrName: メッセルダムの事件にも 関係してたのは間違いねぇだろう。
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダムの事件にも
関係してたのは間違いねぇだろう。

engChrName: That's crazy! How could we have that in Tharbad...?
engSearchText: That's crazy! How could we have that in Tharbad...?
jpnChrName: サ、サルバッドにそんなものが……
jpnSearchText: サ、サルバッドにそんなものが……

engChrName: Holy... This is an enormous scoop!
engSearchText: Holy... This is an enormous scoop!
jpnChrName: すごいスクープですっ……！
jpnSearchText: すごいスクープですっ……！

engChrName: I'm impressed you caught up to us so quickly. We had been investigating for a month.
engSearchText:
I'm impressed you caught up to us so quickly. We had
been investigating for a month.
jpnChrName: フッ、一月近く探っていた 私たちに追いつくとはね……
jpnSearchText:
フッ、一月近く探っていた
私たちに追いつくとはね……

engChrName: It seems I was right to come down here and enter the fray myself.
engSearchText:
It seems I was right to come down here and enter the
fray myself.
jpnChrName: ──やはり直接ここに 乗り込んできて正解だったようだ。
jpnSearchText:
──やはり直接ここに
乗り込んできて正解だったようだ。
……！？

engChrName: Oho.
engSearchText: Oho.
jpnChrName: へえ……？
jpnSearchText: へえ……？

engChrName: So...we're both after the same thing.
engSearchText: So...we're both after the same thing.
jpnChrName: ……目的は同じ。
jpnSearchText: ……目的は同じ。

engChrName: But I get the feeling you're not here to team up with us, are you?
engSearchText:
But I get the feeling you're not here to team up with
us, are you?
jpnChrName: だが協力に来たって ノリでもなさそうですね？
jpnSearchText:
だが協力に来たって
ノリでもなさそうですね？

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?
jpnSearchText: え……

engChrName: Haha. It's a shame, really. Everything else aside, on a personal level, I feel like you and I could get along quite well.
engSearchText:
Haha. It's a shame, really. Everything else aside, on a
personal level, I feel like you and I could get along
quite well.
jpnChrName: フフ……君とは個人的には 気が合いそうだとは思ったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……君とは個人的には
気が合いそうだとは思ったんだが。

engChrName: Unfortunately, among other matters, I'm not on the best of terms with the employer of that maid of yours.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, among other matters, I'm not on the
best of terms with the employer of that maid of yours.
jpnChrName: 元々、そちらのメイド君の “出向元”とは折り合いが悪くてね。
jpnSearchText:
元々、そちらのメイド君の
“出向元”とは折り合いが悪くてね。

engChrName: ...I'm sorry to hear that.
engSearchText: ...I'm sorry to hear that.
jpnChrName: ……恐れ入ります。
jpnSearchText: ……恐れ入ります。

engChrName: But even more than that, the number one thing I can't bring myself to trust is you, Van Arkride.
engSearchText:
But even more than that, the number one thing I
can't bring myself to trust is you, Van Arkride.
jpnChrName: 何より信用できないのは君だよ、 ヴァン・アークライド君。
jpnSearchText:
何より信用できないのは君だよ、
ヴァン・アークライド君。

engChrName: Not only are you an external tester for Marduk, you have unique ties to both the seemly and unseemly parts of society.
engSearchText:
Not only are you an external tester for Marduk, you
have unique ties to both the seemly and unseemly
parts of society.
jpnChrName: マルドゥック社の社外テスターにして 表と裏のどちらにも顔が利く特異な立場。
jpnSearchText:
マルドゥック社の社外テスターにして
表と裏のどちらにも顔が利く特異な立場。

engChrName: In fact, depending on the situation, I suspect those ties could run even as far as the likes of 'them.'
engSearchText:
In fact, depending on the situation, I suspect those
ties could run even as far as the likes of 'them.'
jpnChrName: ……場合によっては“彼ら”と 裏で繋がっている可能性もありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
……場合によっては“彼ら”と
裏で繋がっている可能性もありそうだ。

engChrName: Wh-What?! You can't be serious!
engSearchText: Wh-What?! You can't be serious!
jpnChrName: っ……そんなっ！？
jpnSearchText: っ……そんなっ！？

engChrName: Now hold on. You accusing our boss of working with Almata?
engSearchText:
Now hold on. You accusing our boss of working
with Almata?
jpnChrName: ハア……？ コイツがアルマータとか？
jpnSearchText:
ハア……？
コイツがアルマータとか？

engChrName: I'll put it like this: as long as they respect my rules, I'm not, in principle, above workin' for any particular client.
engSearchText:
I'll put it like this: as long as they respect my rules,
I'm not, in principle, above workin' for any
particular client.
jpnChrName: ま、確かに筋さえ通せばどんな連中の 依頼も受ける可能性はありますがね──
jpnSearchText:
ま、確かに筋さえ通せばどんな連中の
依頼も受ける可能性はありますがね──

engChrName: But in practice, he would NEVER work for them. They've crossed far too many lines at this point.
engSearchText:
But in practice, he would NEVER work for them.
They've crossed far too many lines at this point.
jpnChrName: でもあり得ません……あの人たちは 幾つも一線を踏み越えていますから。
jpnSearchText:
でもあり得ません……あの人たちは
幾つも一線を踏み越えていますから。

engChrName: I'm confident if they ever came to him asking for his help, he would refuse.
engSearchText:
I'm confident if they ever came to him asking for his
help, he would refuse.
jpnChrName: その時点でヴァンさんが 受ける可能性はゼロだと思います。
jpnSearchText:
その時点でヴァンさんが
受ける可能性はゼロだと思います。
……………………

engChrName: Agnès...
engSearchText: Agnès...
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……

engChrName: You have some loyal assistants, I see. But that does little to assuage my concerns.
engSearchText:
You have some loyal assistants, I see. But that does
little to assuage my concerns.
jpnChrName: ふふ、良い助手を持ったね。 だが──それとこれとは話が別だ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、良い助手を持ったね。
だが──それとこれとは話が別だ。

engChrName: She's got a gun shamshir!
engSearchText: She's got a gun shamshir!
jpnChrName: 湾曲銃刀（ガンシャムシール）……！
jpnSearchText: 湾曲銃刀（ガンシャムシール）……！

engChrName: Heh! Now we're talking! I hardly broke a sweat with those losers earlier.
engSearchText:
Heh! Now we're talking! I hardly broke a sweat with
those losers earlier.
jpnChrName: クク、上等だ…… さっきはザコばかりだったからな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、上等だ……
さっきはザコばかりだったからな。

engChrName: Wh-What the...?!
engSearchText: Wh-What the...?!
jpnChrName: えっ、えっ……！？
jpnSearchText: えっ、えっ……！？

engChrName: Can someone explain what's going on here?!
engSearchText: Can someone explain what's going on here?!
jpnChrName: なんなの、どうなってるの～！？
jpnSearchText: なんなの、どうなってるの～！？

engChrName: It seems we're left with no choice.
engSearchText: It seems we're left with no choice.
jpnChrName: 是非もなし、ですか。
jpnSearchText: 是非もなし、ですか。

engChrName: Nope. I take it you're throwing your hat in the ring, too, Your Highness?
engSearchText:
Nope. I take it you're throwing your hat in
the ring, too, Your Highness?
jpnChrName: ああ……しかし アンタもやるつもりかい？
jpnSearchText:
ああ……しかし
アンタもやるつもりかい？

engChrName: Why not? It's all in good fun. Though Naje here is more than capable on her own.
engSearchText:
Why not? It's all in good fun. Though Naje here is
more than capable on her own.
jpnChrName: なに、ただの余興さ。 彼女一人でも十分だろうがね。
jpnSearchText:
なに、ただの余興さ。
彼女一人でも十分だろうがね。

engChrName: Either way, words alone simply are not enough for me to surmise the strength and character of you and the rest of your team.
engSearchText:
Either way, words alone simply are not enough for
me to surmise the strength and character of you and
the rest of your team.
jpnChrName: 言葉だけでは不足だ…… 君と、君たちの力と質（たち）を推し量るには。
jpnSearchText:
言葉だけでは不足だ……
君と、君たちの力と質（たち）を推し量るには。

engChrName: And so I, Sherid Asval...
engSearchText: And so I, Sherid Asval...
jpnChrName: このシェリド・アスヴァール──
jpnSearchText: このシェリド・アスヴァール──

engChrName: ...shall personally evaluate Arkride Solutions!
engSearchText: ...shall personally evaluate Arkride Solutions!
jpnChrName: 手ずからアークライド解決事務所を 検分させてもらうよ！
jpnSearchText:
手ずからアークライド解決事務所を
検分させてもらうよ！

engChrName: And I, Naje Berka, stand with him!
engSearchText: And I, Naje Berka, stand with him!
jpnChrName: 公王家護衛官ナージェ・ベルカ、参る……！
jpnSearchText: 公王家護衛官ナージェ・ベルカ、参る……！

engChrName: They're formidable.
engSearchText: They're formidable.
jpnChrName: ……中々やりますね。
jpnSearchText: ……中々やりますね。

engChrName: I'm impressed they held out this long.
engSearchText: I'm impressed they held out this long.
jpnChrName: ハハ、ここまでとはね……！
jpnSearchText: ハハ、ここまでとはね……！

engChrName: I think we've evaluated them enough.
engSearchText: I think we've evaluated them enough.
jpnChrName: ナージェ、 様子見はもう十分だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ナージェ、
様子見はもう十分だろう。

engChrName: Shall I end it, then?
engSearchText: Shall I end it, then?
jpnChrName: ……仕留めても？
jpnSearchText: ……仕留めても？

engChrName: Go easy on the lackeys. Otherwise? By all means.
engSearchText: Go easy on the lackeys. Otherwise? By all means.
jpnChrName: 助手君たち以外は そのつもりで行くといい！
jpnSearchText:
助手君たち以外は
そのつもりで行くといい！

engChrName: Oh, screw you!
engSearchText: Oh, screw you!
jpnChrName: ナメんな……！！
jpnSearchText: ナメんな……！！

engChrName: Well, all right, then—guess we're doin' this!
engSearchText: Well, all right, then—guess we're doin' this!
jpnChrName: やれやれ──仕方ねえな！
jpnSearchText: やれやれ──仕方ねえな！

engChrName: Don't even think about it.
engSearchText: Don't even think about it.
jpnChrName: ──双方そこまで。
jpnSearchText: ──双方そこまで。
……！

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnSearchText: なに……！？

engChrName: It's Sylphid...
engSearchText: It's Sylphid...
jpnSearchText: ……妖精………

engChrName: Well, would you look at that? I didn't think you'd get here so soon, Fie.
engSearchText:
Well, would you look at that? I didn't think you'd get
here so soon, Fie.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、フィー君…… もう到着したのかい。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、フィー君……
もう到着したのかい。

engChrName: Well, I have. That's enough, Your Highness.
engSearchText: Well, I have. That's enough, Your Highness.
jpnChrName: 殿下、そのくらいで。
jpnSearchText: 殿下、そのくらいで。

engChrName: Playtime's over. Now that I'm here, we need to let the victims rest.
engSearchText:
Playtime's over. Now that I'm here, we need to let the
victims rest.
jpnChrName: わたしが来た以上、その子たちを 休ませるのを優先させてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
わたしが来た以上、その子たちを
休ませるのを優先させてもらう。

engChrName: Marielle, are you all right?!
engSearchText: Marielle, are you all right?!
jpnChrName: マリエル、無事か……！
jpnSearchText: マリエル、無事か……！

engChrName: Dingo!
engSearchText: Dingo!
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん……！？
jpnSearchText: ディンゴさん……！？

engChrName: *sniffle* Where have you been? I've been trying to get a hold of you all this time!
engSearchText:
*sniffle* Where have you been? I've been trying to get
a hold of you all this time!
jpnChrName: ううっ、どこにいたんですかっ！？ 今朝からぜんぜん連絡が──！
jpnSearchText:
ううっ、どこにいたんですかっ！？
今朝からぜんぜん連絡が──！

engChrName: ...Heh. Guess I had nothing to worry about.
engSearchText: ...Heh. Guess I had nothing to worry about.
jpnChrName: ……フッ、大丈夫そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……フッ、大丈夫そうだな。

engChrName: These must be the perpetrators.
engSearchText: These must be the perpetrators.
jpnChrName: こいつらが誘拐犯か。
jpnSearchText: こいつらが誘拐犯か。

engChrName: This saves us a lot of trouble. You okay if we bring them in?
engSearchText:
This saves us a lot of trouble. You okay if we bring
them in?
jpnChrName: 助かりました。 こちらで確保しても？
jpnSearchText:
助かりました。
こちらで確保しても？

engChrName: Oh, you must be the bracer from Erebonia.
engSearchText: Oh, you must be the bracer from Erebonia.
jpnChrName: 伺っていた帝国からの……
jpnSearchText: 伺っていた帝国からの……

engChrName: Did you respond to Dingo's call for help?
engSearchText: Did you respond to Dingo's call for help?
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんの連絡で 応援に来て下さったんですね？
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんの連絡で
応援に来て下さったんですね？

engChrName: Yep. Luckily, I just got into town a little while ago.
engSearchText: Yep. Luckily, I just got into town a little while ago.
jpnChrName: ん、わたしはサルバッドに さっき着いたばかりだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ん、わたしはサルバッドに
さっき着いたばかりだけど。

engChrName: Seems like I might've gotten here a bit late, though.
engSearchText: Seems like I might've gotten here a bit late, though.
jpnChrName: 少し遅れちゃったかな？
jpnSearchText: 少し遅れちゃったかな？

engChrName: Nah, don't sweat it. Your timing was perfect.
engSearchText: Nah, don't sweat it. Your timing was perfect.
jpnChrName: いや、良いタイミングだったぜ。
jpnSearchText: いや、良いタイミングだったぜ。

engChrName: So you say. But I would've liked to see those depths of yours a little more, as it were.
engSearchText:
So you say. But I would've liked to see those depths
of yours a little more, as it were.
jpnChrName: フフ、残念だ。 もう少し“底”が見たかったが。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、残念だ。
もう少し“底”が見たかったが。

engChrName: Especially when it comes to those mysterious objects and that...curious figure you like to adopt.
engSearchText:
Especially when it comes to those mysterious objects
and that...curious figure you like to adopt.
jpnChrName: 謎めいた“捜し物”に── 不可思議な黎（あおぐろ）い異形についても。
jpnSearchText:
謎めいた“捜し物”に──
不可思議な黎（あおぐろ）い異形についても。

engChrName: So you were interested in all that, too, were you?
engSearchText: So you were interested in all that, too, were you?
jpnChrName: ……成程、そちらも狙いか。
jpnSearchText: ……成程、そちらも狙いか。

engChrName: I can understand how that looks suspicious, but trust me, he's more than legit enough to make up for it.
engSearchText:
I can understand how that looks suspicious, but trust
me, he's more than legit enough to make up for it.
jpnChrName: ま、怪しいけど 同じくらい信頼できるのも確か。
jpnSearchText:
ま、怪しいけど
同じくらい信頼できるのも確か。

engChrName: Anyway, the police should be here any minute. Do you mind if we take it from here?
engSearchText:
Anyway, the police should be here any minute.
Do you mind if we take it from here?
jpnChrName: 警察もそろそろ来そうだし いったん任せてくれないかな？
jpnSearchText:
警察もそろそろ来そうだし
いったん任せてくれないかな？

engChrName: Not at all. In fact, that's what I expected. Also, Naje, if you would.
engSearchText:
Not at all. In fact, that's what I expected. Also, Naje,
if you would.
jpnChrName: ああ、元よりそのつもりだ。 ──ナージェ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、元よりそのつもりだ。
──ナージェ。

engChrName: Yes, Your Highness.
engSearchText: Yes, Your Highness.
jpnChrName: は。
jpnSearchText: は。

engChrName: Allow me to offer you both this water.
engSearchText: Allow me to offer you both this water.
jpnChrName: どうぞ、お水を。
jpnSearchText: どうぞ、お水を。

engChrName: Hrm...
engSearchText: Hrm...

engChrName: *sigh* This has all been so much.
engSearchText: *sigh* This has all been so much.
jpnChrName: はあ、なんだか 色々ありすぎて……
jpnSearchText:
はあ、なんだか
色々ありすぎて……

engChrName: Does all this mean I pass your test, then?
engSearchText: Does all this mean I pass your test, then?
jpnChrName: で、一応合格って ことでいいんですかね？
jpnSearchText:
で、一応合格って
ことでいいんですかね？

engChrName: That you do, abrupt ending aside. I'm satisfied with your strength.
engSearchText:
That you do, abrupt ending aside. I'm satisfied with
your strength.
jpnChrName: ああ、底はともかく実力はね。
jpnSearchText: ああ、底はともかく実力はね。

engChrName: Please feel free to continue working on my request, as circumstances permit.
engSearchText:
Please feel free to continue working on my request, as
circumstances permit.
jpnChrName: 共同依頼についても このまま継続でお願いしよう。
jpnSearchText:
共同依頼についても
このまま継続でお願いしよう。

engChrName: As for that plant, I would like to claim half of it. The guild can retain the remainder.
engSearchText:
As for that plant, I would like to claim half of it.
The guild can retain the remainder.
jpnChrName: そちらの植物はギルドと合わせて “折半”するのが良さそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
そちらの植物はギルドと合わせて
“折半”するのが良さそうだが。

engChrName: Oh, right. I forgot all about that big guy.
engSearchText: Oh, right. I forgot all about that big guy.
jpnChrName: こいつがあったか……
jpnSearchText: こいつがあったか……

engChrName: If you don't mind, I'd also like to retrieve a sample of it.
engSearchText:
If you don't mind, I'd also like to retrieve a sample
of it.
jpnChrName: 念のためサンプルを 採取させていただきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
念のためサンプルを
採取させていただきましょう。

engChrName: With that, Van Arkride...show me just what you can do.
engSearchText:
With that, Van Arkride...show me just what you
can do.
jpnChrName: フフ──それでは せいぜい証明してみるといい。
jpnSearchText:
フフ──それでは
せいぜい証明してみるといい。

engChrName: What truths you, in all of your unknowable depths, can uncover...
engSearchText:
What truths you, in all of your unknowable depths,
can uncover...
jpnChrName: 見えざる《Ａ》の気配が 濃密に漂うこの黄金の都（エルドラド）で……
jpnSearchText:
見えざる《Ａ》の気配が
濃密に漂うこの黄金の都（エルドラド）で……

engChrName: ...in this city of gold, as their invisible yet heavy hand looms over it.
engSearchText:
...in this city of gold, as their invisible yet heavy hand
looms over it.
jpnChrName: どこまでも底の見えない君が いったい何を明かしてくれるかをね。
jpnSearchText:
どこまでも底の見えない君が
いったい何を明かしてくれるかをね。

engChrName: From there, Prince Sherid and Naje promptly returned to town via his personal airship.
engSearchText:
From there, Prince Sherid and Naje promptly
returned to town via his personal airship.
jpnChrName: その後、公太子たちは停泊させていた 専用飛行船で一足先に街へ戻っていき──
jpnSearchText:
その後、公太子たちは停泊させていた
専用飛行船で一足先に街へ戻っていき──

engChrName: Likewise, Van and the others also made their way back to Tharbad, entrusting the kidnappers to the bracers on site.
engSearchText:
Likewise, Van and the others also made their way
back to Tharbad, entrusting the kidnappers to the
bracers on site.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは、現地の遊撃士たちに 誘拐犯を任せてサルバッドへと戻った。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは、現地の遊撃士たちに
誘拐犯を任せてサルバッドへと戻った。

engChrName: Looks like we've found some cargo. Doesn't seem to have been dropped that long ago.
engSearchText:
Looks like we've found some cargo. Doesn't seem to
have been dropped that long ago.
jpnChrName: おっとこの荷物は…… 見た所、最近落としたモンみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
おっとこの荷物は……
見た所、最近落としたモンみてえだな。

engChrName: Maybe it fell off when the caravan got attacked by those monsters.
engSearchText:
Maybe it fell off when the caravan got attacked by
those monsters.
jpnChrName: 例の商隊が魔獣に襲われた際に 落としたのかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
例の商隊が魔獣に襲われた際に
落としたのかもしれませんね。

engChrName: I don't see any camels anywhere. Think those monsters gobbled our objective up?
engSearchText:
I don't see any camels anywhere. Think those
monsters gobbled our objective up?
jpnChrName: だが、辺りにラクダがいる様子はねえぞ。 魔獣に食われちまったのか？
jpnSearchText:
だが、辺りにラクダがいる様子はねえぞ。
魔獣に食われちまったのか？

engChrName: Urgh, Aaron! Don't say things like that! That poor camel...
engSearchText:
Urgh, Aaron! Don't say things like that! That
poor camel...
jpnChrName: もう、滅多なこと言わないで下さい。 ラクダが可哀想じゃないですかっ。
jpnSearchText:
もう、滅多なこと言わないで下さい。
ラクダが可哀想じゃないですかっ。

engChrName: I'm kidding, small fry. Chill out.
engSearchText: I'm kidding, small fry. Chill out.
jpnChrName: 冗談だっつの。
jpnSearchText: 冗談だっつの。

engChrName: Let's assume it's still with us. We need to figure out what direction it went once it got separated from the caravan.
engSearchText:
Let's assume it's still with us. We need to figure out
what direction it went once it got separated from
the caravan.
jpnChrName: 問題は、ここで商隊とはぐれたラクダが どこへ向かったのかだな。
jpnSearchText:
問題は、ここで商隊とはぐれたラクダが
どこへ向かったのかだな。

engChrName: Given the climate and heat, my bet's that it either took off for a watering hole or went to find some shade.
engSearchText:
Given the climate and heat, my bet's that it either
took off for a watering hole or went to find
some shade.
jpnChrName: この暑さでこの気候…… 水場か日陰にでも行きそうな所だが。
jpnSearchText:
この暑さでこの気候……
水場か日陰にでも行きそうな所だが。

engChrName: But according to the map, there's nowhere to drink water around here.
engSearchText:
But according to the map, there's nowhere to drink
water around here.
jpnChrName: 地図を見ても、 近くに水場は無さそうでしたけど……
jpnSearchText:
地図を見ても、
近くに水場は無さそうでしたけど……

engChrName: Actually, camels don't necessarily need an oasis or anything to stay hydrated.
engSearchText:
Actually, camels don't necessarily need an oasis or
anything to stay hydrated.
jpnChrName: あっ、水場は無くても 水分補給ならできますよ！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、水場は無くても
水分補給ならできますよ！

engChrName: They can break off cacti and suck up the water that's inside!
engSearchText:
They can break off cacti and suck up the water
that's inside!
jpnChrName: サボテンを折って、 果肉から水分を啜るんです。
jpnSearchText:
サボテンを折って、
果肉から水分を啜るんです。

engChrName: Even the Kruga do that all the time, when they have to work in real wastelands and stuff.
engSearchText:
Even the Kruga do that all the time, when they have
to work in real wastelands and stuff.
jpnChrName: 荒野のような険しい環境では クルガの皆でそうしてましたっ。
jpnSearchText:
荒野のような険しい環境では
クルガの皆でそうしてましたっ。

engChrName: Nice. I think you're on to something, Feri.
engSearchText: Nice. I think you're on to something, Feri.
jpnChrName: ああ、冴えてるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、冴えてるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Any camel worth its salt in the desert is bound to know other ways to find water.
engSearchText:
Any camel worth its salt in the desert is bound to
know other ways to find water.
jpnChrName: 普段砂漠を渡ってるラクダなら 理解しててもおかしくねえ。
jpnSearchText:
普段砂漠を渡ってるラクダなら
理解しててもおかしくねえ。

engChrName: That's interesting! I wouldn't have considered cacti.
engSearchText: That's interesting! I wouldn't have considered cacti.
jpnChrName: なるほど、サボテンですか……！
jpnSearchText: なるほど、サボテンですか……！

engChrName: What do you know, I actually learned something new from our pipsqueak today.
engSearchText:
What do you know, I actually learned something new
from our pipsqueak today.
jpnChrName: へぇ、まさかチビ助から 学ばされるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、まさかチビ助から
学ばされるとはな。

engChrName: Heehee! Stop it, you guys, you're gonna make me blush!
engSearchText:
Heehee! Stop it, you guys, you're gonna make
me blush!
jpnChrName: えへへ……そんなに褒められると 照れちゃいますっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……そんなに褒められると
照れちゃいますっ。

engChrName: But unfortunately, I don't see any cacti that've been nibbled on recently, looking around.
engSearchText:
But unfortunately, I don't see any cacti that've been
nibbled on recently, looking around.
jpnChrName: でも残念ながら、見渡す限りだと 近くに折れたサボテンはなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
でも残念ながら、見渡す限りだと
近くに折れたサボテンはなさそうですね。

engChrName: Well, what if it went somewhere to try and get out of the sandstorm first?
engSearchText:
Well, what if it went somewhere to try and get out of
the sandstorm first?
jpnChrName: もう少し砂嵐を避けられるような場所を 探した方がいいかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
もう少し砂嵐を避けられるような場所を
探した方がいいかもしれませんね。

engChrName: I could see someone taking shelter and staying hydrated using the cacti there.
engSearchText:
I could see someone taking shelter and staying
hydrated using the cacti there.
jpnChrName: そういう場所なら、誰かがサボテンを折って、 水分補給している可能性もありそうかと。
jpnSearchText:
そういう場所なら、誰かがサボテンを折って、
水分補給している可能性もありそうかと。

engChrName: Then how's about we try heading in...say, that direction?
engSearchText:
Then how's about we try heading in...say,
that direction?
jpnChrName: つう事なら、あっちの方角はどうだ？
jpnSearchText: つう事なら、あっちの方角はどうだ？

engChrName: Looks pretty rocky. Probably makes for decent protection against the winds around here.
engSearchText:
Looks pretty rocky. Probably makes for decent
protection against the winds around here.
jpnChrName: それなりに岩があって 多少は砂嵐から身を守れそうじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
それなりに岩があって
多少は砂嵐から身を守れそうじゃねーか。

engChrName: Yeah, I'd say it's worth checking it out. Let's see what we can find over there.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I'd say it's worth checking it out. Let's see what
we can find over there.
jpnChrName: ああ、賭けてみる価値はありそうだな。 試しに行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、賭けてみる価値はありそうだな。
試しに行ってみるか。

engChrName: Hey, look what's under attack!
engSearchText: Hey, look what's under attack!
jpnChrName: オイ、あそこで囲まれてやがるのは……
jpnSearchText: オイ、あそこで囲まれてやがるのは……

engChrName: Ah, hell, that must be our camel! Better step in before things go south.
engSearchText:
Ah, hell, that must be our camel! Better step in before
things go south.
jpnChrName: チッ、ラクダか── 急いで魔獣を蹴散らすぞ！
jpnSearchText:
チッ、ラクダか──
急いで魔獣を蹴散らすぞ！

engChrName: Ugh... My feet feel like boulders at this point. But now isn't the time to complain!
engSearchText:
Ugh... My feet feel like boulders at this point.
But now isn't the time to complain!
jpnChrName: ううっ……足が重いですけど…… ここが踏ん張りどころですね！
jpnSearchText:
ううっ……足が重いですけど……
ここが踏ん張りどころですね！

engChrName: That's right! We've got a camel to save!
engSearchText: That's right! We've got a camel to save!
jpnChrName: 一緒に頑張りましょう、アニエスさんっ！
jpnSearchText: 一緒に頑張りましょう、アニエスさんっ！

engChrName: Phew. That had me worried for a moment.
engSearchText: Phew. That had me worried for a moment.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、ヒヤヒヤさせやがって……
jpnSearchText: ふぅ、ヒヤヒヤさせやがって……

engChrName: I know. I'm just glad we were able to find the camel in one piece.
engSearchText:
I know. I'm just glad we were able to find the camel
in one piece.
jpnChrName: はぁ……でも、なんとか無事に ラクダと合流出来ましたね。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……でも、なんとか無事に
ラクダと合流出来ましたね。

engChrName: Judging by those cactus chunks, my hunch was right. He must've been thirsty and came over for a drink.
engSearchText:
Judging by those cactus chunks, my hunch was right.
He must've been thirsty and came over for a drink.
jpnChrName: えへへ、このラクダは やっぱり水を飲みに来ていたみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、このラクダは
やっぱり水を飲みに来ていたみたいです。

engChrName: I bet he's pretty tired from hauling all that cargo around for so long. Poor guy.
engSearchText:
I bet he's pretty tired from hauling all that cargo
around for so long. Poor guy.
jpnChrName: 背中に荷物を背負ってる事もあって、 疲れてたのかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
背中に荷物を背負ってる事もあって、
疲れてたのかもしれませんね。

engChrName: What about the goods? Is that raw cacao stuff still intact?
engSearchText:
What about the goods? Is that raw cacao stuff
still intact?
jpnChrName: 荷物っていやあ、 生カカオってのは無事なのか？
jpnSearchText:
荷物っていやあ、
生カカオってのは無事なのか？

engChrName: Not that I care THAT much. It'd just suck to come this far and have nothing to show for it.
engSearchText:
Not that I care THAT much. It'd just suck to come
this far and have nothing to show for it.
